name: Edypos
description:
Edypos is an RPG featuring Adventures with Monster Girls.
(Warning: This game contains Weight gain and other small fetish elements)

Edypos - once a thriving plane of existence, civilization has all but gone. In its place, Feras - Nature’s spirits having gained material form, reclaims the desolate lands. Weak and alone, you have awakened to explore this plane. The world of Edypos however is a dangerous place to traverse by yourself. Although some Feras can develop higher thinking and sentience, Most Feras are still driven by instincts, mainly to feed.

Living creatures displaced from its original surroundings by hardship, most developed amongst the Feras. They are known as Waifs (from the Old French: Guaif, “stray beast”).

In order to exponentially increase your chance of survival, you will need their help, and so will they.

Demo Available now.
